snippet: Bernard Arnault will distribute to shareholders the stake he built up in Hermès. But Groupe Arnault will retain 8.5 percent of its capital, suggesting it is keeping its long-term options open, Carol Ryan of Reuters Breakingviews writes.
abstract: Bernard Arnault will distribute to shareholders the stake he built up in Hermès. But Groupe Arnault will retain 8.5 percent of its capital, suggesting it is keeping its long-term options open, Carol Ryan of Reuters Breakingviews writes.

headline.main: In Hermès Agreement, a Rare Retreat by a Luxury Deal Maker
